name: Garmin HRM PRO Chest Strap - Unisex
description: All the best features combined in one super strap. The PRO strap has the running dynamic features from the HRM Run strap, plus the pool-time  memory and data upload from the HRM Swim and Tri. Add in activity tracking, and this is the most versatile heart rate strap Garmin has ever made.Internal accelerometer measures torso movement to calculate cadence in steps per minute, vertical oscillation of your torso (measured in centimeters), ground contact time measured in milliseconds and activity tracking data.Memory stores training and daily activity data, great for pools or activities where a watch cannot be worn – data is uploaded to your device when in range.CR2032 battery runs for 1 year with 1 hour of training per day, and battery status is displayed in Garmin Connect™.Supports heart rate variability and advanced heart rate features.Communicates via Bluetooth™ (5.0) and ANT+ (2.5GHz).Supports stand-alone activity monitoring (steps, all-day heart rate, calories and intensity minutes) and TrueUp™.Strap dimensions are 60.0 to 142 x 3 x 1.2cm, fits torsos from 60–106cm in circumference.Soft rounded edges are comfortable to wear.
